      • issueAlreadyExist

        public static boolean issueAlreadyExist​(String jiraQuery,
                                        String label)
        This method can be used to check if a bug or task for a particular label is already exists in JIRA.
        Parameters:
        jiraQuery - - jira query required for the filtration of the results. e.g if project is TGAF and we want all bugs in the project it can be filtered as "project = TGAF AND issuetype = Bug"
        label - - Label should be unique like a test method name so we'll not create multiple issue for the same failed test method.
        Returns:

        public static void createSubtask​(String key,

                                 String subtaskSummary,
                                 String subtaskAssignee)
        This method can be used to create a subtask in JIRA.
        Parameters:
        key - - key of the issue under which you want to create subtask.
        label - - label for the subtask you want to create.
        subtaskSummary -
        subtaskAssignee -
